Author: sickcupcake
Text: Every time I eat with my boyfriend, I end up feeling incredibly anxious afterwards, and he is so supportive and comforting. I feel guilty for ruining something as simple as just having dinner together while watching a movie. Simple things like eating and clothes shopping are just a lot harder or people like us.
